DocAnnex.Name: Computer interpretable listings
DocAnnex.Documentation:
This annex contains a listing of the complete EXPRESS schema combining all definitions of clauses 5, 6, 7, and 8 without comments or other explanatory text. These listings are available in computer-interpretable form that may be parsed by computer.
> NOTE  A ".txt" extension has been appended to the name of the ASCII file in order to ensure that it displays properly in a web browser. To use one of these files in a software application, remove the ".txt" extension.
Schemas are also published at the following URLs:
* **IFC EXPRESS**: [http://buildingsmart-tech.org/ifc/IFC4/final/IFC4.exp](http://buildingsmart-tech.org/ifc/IFC4/final/IFC4.exp) * **ifcXML XSD**: [http://www.buildingsmart-tech.org/ifcXML/IFC4/final/ifcXML4.xsd](http://www.buildingsmart-tech.org/ifcXML/IFC4/final/ifcXML4.xsd) * **ifcXML Config**: [http://www.buildingsmart-tech.org/ifcXML/IFC4/final/config/ifcXML4_config.xml](http://www.buildingsmart-tech.org/ifcXML/IFC4/final/config/ifcXML4_config.xml)

DocAnnex.Name: Alphabetical listings
DocAnnex.Documentation: This annex contains listings of definitions an alphabetical order according to identifier and language-specific name.

DocAnnex.Name: Inheritance listings
DocAnnex.Documentation: This annex contains listings of entity definitions organized by inheritance.

DocAnnex.Name: Diagrams
DocAnnex.Documentation: This annex contains schema and instance diagrams.

DocAnnex.Name: Examples
DocAnnex.Documentation: This annex contains examples that implement this specification.

DocAnnex.Name: Change logs
DocAnnex.Documentation: This annex contains change logs comparing IFC4 to the previous version IFC2X3 TC1.
